mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NP_CSTLOG ( NCL_LOGNO, NCL_LOGTIME, NCL_LOGBEGTIME, NCL_LOGENDTIME, NCL_CSTNO, NCL_CARDNO, NCL_TRANCOD, NCL_IP, NCL_OPRRLT, NCL_BANKCODE, NCL_LOG1, NCL_PRONO, NCL_LOG2, NCL_LOG3, NCL_LOG4 ) VALUES ( #{NCL_LOGNO}, #{NCL_LOGTIME}, #{NCL_LOGBEGTIME}, #{NCL_LOGENDTIME}, #{NCL_CSTNO}, #{NCL_CARDNO}, #{NCL_TRANCOD}, #{NCL_IP}, #{NCL_OPRRLT}, #{NCL_BANKCODE}, #{NCL_LOG1}, #{NCL_PRONO}, #{NCL_LOG2}, #{NCL_LOG3}, #{NCL_LOG4} )
